mapper.select: /* CommunityPostMapper.xml selectByPostId 게시글 ID로 조회 */ SELECT cp.post_id, cp.user_id, u.nickname as nickname, cp.category, cp.title, cp.content, cp.content_type, cp.view_count, cp.like_count, cp.comment_count, cp.is_pinned, cp.pin_order, cp.create_date, cp.create_user_id, cp.update_date, cp.update_user_id, cp.delete_date, cp.delete_user_id FROM community_post cp LEFT JOIN "user" u ON cp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cp.post_id = #{postId} AND cp.delete_date IS NULL

/* CommunityPostMapper.xml selectAllPosts 전체 게시글 목록 조회 (페이징) */ SELECT cp.post_id, cp.user_id, u.nickname as nickname, cp.category, cp.title, cp.content, cp.content_type, cp.view_count, cp.like_count, cp.comment_count, cp.is_pinned, cp.pin_order, cp.create_date, cp.create_user_id, cp.update_date, cp.update_user_id, cp.delete_date, cp.delete_user_id FROM community_post cp LEFT JOIN "user" u ON cp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cp.delete_date IS NULL ORDER BY cp.is_pinned DESC, cp.pin_order ASC, cp.create_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}

/* CommunityPostMapper.xml selectPinnedPosts 상단 고정 게시글 목록 조회 */ SELECT cp.post_id, cp.user_id, u.nickname as nickname, cp.category, cp.title, cp.content, cp.content_type, cp.view_count, cp.like_count, cp.comment_count, cp.is_pinned, cp.pin_order, cp.create_date, cp.create_user_id, cp.update_date, cp.update_user_id, cp.delete_date, cp.delete_user_id FROM community_post cp LEFT JOIN "user" u ON cp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cp.delete_date IS NULL AND cp.is_pinned = 'Y' ORDER BY cp.pin_order ASC, cp.create_date DESC
/* CommunityPostMapper.xml countAllPosts 전체 게시글 개수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_post WHERE delete_date IS NULL
mapper.update: /* CommunityPostMapper.xml updatePost 게시글 수정 */ UPDATE community_post SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, content_type = #{contentType}, is_pinned = #{isPinned}, pin_order = #{pinOrder}, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, update_user_id = #{updateUserId} WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND delete_date IS NULL
/* CommunityPostMapper.xml incrementViewCount 조회수 증가 */ UPDATE community_post SET view_count = view_count + 1, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND delete_date IS NULL
/* CommunityPostMapper.xml incrementLikeCount 좋아요 수 증가 */ UPDATE community_post SET like_count = like_count + 1, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND delete_date IS NULL

/* CommunityPostMapper.xml incrementCommentCount 댓글 수 증가 */ UPDATE community_post SET comment_count = comment_count + 1, update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND delete_date IS NULL

/* CommunityPostMapper.xml decrementCommentCount 댓글 수 감소 */ UPDATE community_post SET comment_count = GREATEST(comment_count - 1, 0), update_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = #{postId} AND delete_date IS NULL
mapper.select: /* CommunityPostMapper.xml searchByTitle 제목으로 게시글 검색 */ SELECT cp.post_id, cp.user_id, u.nickname as nickname, cp.category, cp.title, cp.content, cp.content_type, cp.view_count, cp.like_count, cp.comment_count, cp.is_pinned, cp.pin_order, cp.create_date, cp.create_user_id, cp.update_date, cp.update_user_id, cp.delete_date, cp.delete_user_id FROM community_post cp LEFT JOIN "user" u ON cp.user_id = u.user_id WHERE cp.delete_date IS NULL AND cp.title ILIKE '%' || #{title} || '%' ORDER BY cp.is_pinned DESC, cp.pin_order ASC, cp.create_date DESC OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
/* CommunityPostMapper.xml countSearchByTitle 제목으로 검색된 게시글 개수 */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community_post WHERE delete_date IS NULL AND title ILIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
